item.title: Trump defends chief of staff Susie Wiles after she says he has 'alcoholic's personality'
item.description: Wiles, in the rare, candid interviews, described Trump's "reciprocal" tariff policy as "so much thinking out loud."

item.title: Key ACA tax credits likely to expire after House speaker blocks vote
item.description: Democrats in the House back a last-ditch effort to extend Obamacare subsidies, which relies on a tactic recently used for the Jeffrey Epstein files bi...

item.title: What Trump's reclassification of pot and CBD could mean for seniors, research and stocks
item.description: Reclassification to a Schedule III drug and possible Medicare coverage for pot could unlock new investment from pharmaceutical companies.

item.title: Bill to ease Big Tech project permits advances in House
item.description: Backers say the SPEED Act is crucial to helping the U.S. beat out China and other global competitors for leadership in AI.
